Method.name: OnPageCSPROOT
Method.Implementation: s source=%request.Get("source") i source'="" { s DocClass=##class(Docs.Action).GetClassFromSource(source) s naklad=##class(Docs.Super).%OpenId(source) s instrname=naklad.Name_$S(DocClass="Docs.StorageOut":"-о",DocClass="Docs.StorageIn":"-р") } s super=%request.Get("super") i super'="" { s superdoc=##class(Operation.Instructions).%OpenId(super) s instr=superdoc.innerinstr i $ISOBJECT(instr) { s doc=instr.%Id() s DocClass=$P(instr,"@",2) } } s:$G(DocClass)'="" DocType=##class(Docs.Action).GetDocNameFromClass(DocClass) k ^mtempAddress($G(%session.Data("user"),"undef")) Write ! Do ..OnPageHTML()

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,"<title>"_($G(%session.Data("systemname")))_"</title>",! Write "<link href=""style.css"" type=text/css rel=stylesheet>" Write !,!,"<script language=""Jscript"" src=""common.js"">" Write "</script>" Write !,"<script language=""JScript"">" Write !,"if(("""_($G(doc))_"""=="""")&&("""_($G(super))_"""!="""")){alert(""Внутренняя инструкция ещё не привязана к данной инструкции"");window.close();}",! Write "var Arguments=window.dialogArguments.split(InnerSplitter);",! Write "var ClassName=ReturnSpace(Arguments[0]);",! Write "var DocID=ReturnSpace(Arguments[1]);",! Write "var DocType=ReturnSpace(Arguments[2]);",! Write "var source="""_(source)_""";",! Write "if("""_($G(DocClass))_"""!=""""){",! Write " var ClassName="""_($G(DocClass))_"""",! Write "}",! Write "if("""_($G(DocType))_"""!=""""){",! Write " var DocType="""_($G(DocType))_"""",! Write "}",! Write "if("""_($G(doc))_"""!=""""){",! Write " var DocID="""_($G(doc))_"""",! Write "}",! Write "function load(){",! Write "if(ClassName!=""Docs.StorageOut"")docstr.runValidateAddress=""true"";",! Write "PropTable.ClassName=ClassName;",! Write "TypDocument.innerText=DocType;",! Write "PropTable.DownLoadPairs("""",DocID,""Dat,Tim,Stat,Source,DocType,Summa,Kontr,User1"");",! Write "docstr.ClassName=ClassName+""Items"";",! Write "docstr.LoadHeadersXML(""Doc,DocType,Quantity,Price,Total"");",! Write "}",! Write !,"function startFun(){",! Write "DocID=ReturnSpace(Arguments[1]);",! Write "var xmldoc=PropTable.GetXmlContent();",! Write "var xmldoc2=docstr.GetXmlContent();",! Write "var DocID=SplitSendXml(DocID,ClassName,xmldoc,xmldoc2,"""_(%session.SessionId)_""");",! Write "if(isNaN(DocID)){alert(DocID);return}",! Write "if(source!=""""){",! Write " var ok="_($case(%session.BrokerImplementation,1:"cspRunServerMethod",2:"cspHttpServerMethod",:"cspSelectServerMethod"))_"('"_(..Encrypt($listbuild("Docs.Action.SetSourceDoc:csp.createstorage"))_$select(%session.UseSessionCookie'=2:"&CSPCHD="_%session.CSPSessionCookie,1:""))_"',ClassName,DocID,source);",! Write " if(isNaN(ok)){alert(ok);return;}",! Write "}",! Write "var ok3="_($case(%session.BrokerImplementation,1:"cspRunServerMethod",2:"cspHttpServerMethod",:"cspSelectServerMethod"))_"('"_(..Encrypt($listbuild("Docs.Action.PrihNeedsDiff:csp.createstorage"))_$select(%session.UseSessionCookie'=2:"&CSPCHD="_%session.CSPSessionCookie,1:""))_"',DocID)",! Write "if(isNaN(ok3)&&(ok3!=""yes"")){alert(ok3);return false;}",! Write "if(ok3==""yes""){",! Write " okdiff=window.showModalDialog(""docinnerdiff.csp?source=""+DocID,""Docs.InnerDiff""+InnerSplitter+""""+InnerSplitter+"""",""cener:yes;status:no;dialogHeight:600px;dialogWidth:800px;resizable:yes;"")",! Write " if(okdiff!=1){",! Write " if(okdiff!=null)alert(okdiff);",! Write " return false;}",! Write " var ok2="_($case(%session.BrokerImplementation,1:"cspRunServerMethod",2:"cspHttpServerMethod",:"cspSelectServerMethod"))_"('"_(..Encrypt($listbuild("Docs.Action.SetSourceDoc:csp.createstorage"))_$select(%session.UseSessionCookie'=2:"&CSPCHD="_%session.CSPSessionCookie,1:""))_"',""Docs.InnerDiff"",okdiff,DocID)",! Write " } ",! Write "returnValue=1;",! Write "window.close();",! Write "}",! Write !,"function LoadTovars(){",! Write "if(source==""""){var doc=DocID;}",! Write "else{var doc=source;}",! Write "docstr.loadfrommethod(""Docs.Action.GetStrFromDoc"",doc,"""",ClassName);",! Write "}",! Write !,"//function ValidateAddress(Goods, Address, Value){",! Write "function ValidateAddress(RowArray2){",! Write "var Address=RowArray2[""addr""]",! Write "var Value=RowArray2[""quantdefault""]",! Write "var Goods=RowArray2[""Goods""]",! Write !,"var ret="_($case(%session.BrokerImplementation,1:"cspRunServerMethod",2:"cspHttpServerMethod",:"cspSelectServerMethod"))_"('"_(..Encrypt($listbuild("Store.Action.validate:csp.createstorage"))_$select(%session.UseSessionCookie'=2:"&CSPCHD="_%session.CSPSessionCookie,1:""))_"',Goods,Address,Value)",! Write "if(ret==1) return true;",! Write "return ret;",! Write "}",! Write !,"function fillname(){",! Write "if(DocID==""""){",! Write "PropTable.setCellValue(""Name"","""_($G(instrname))_""");}",! Write "}",! Write !,"function addtovars(){",! Write "WinResult=window.showModalDialog(""selectgoods2.csp"","""",""center:yes;status:no;dialogHeight:700px;dialogWidth:800px;resizable:yes;"")",! Write "if(WinResult==null)return",! Write "WinResult=WinResult.split(StringSplitter)",! Write "var FieldCaption = new Array();",! Write "var FieldValue = new Array();",! Write "for(i=0 ; i<WinResult.length-1 ; i++){",! Write " var onestr=WinResult[i].split(InnerSplitter);",! Write " FieldCaption[""Goods""]=onestr[1];",! Write " FieldValue[""Goods""]=onestr[0];",! Write " //FieldCaption[""Price""]=getPrice(FieldValue[""Goods""]);",! Write " docstr.AddRow(FieldCaption,FieldValue);",! Write "}",! Write "}",! Write !,"</script>" Write !,(..HyperEventHead()) Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html XMLNS:SKLADz XMLNS:SKLAD2 XMLNS:SKLADList>" Write !,"<IMPORT NAMESPACE=""SKLADz"" IMPLEMENTATION=""htc/treeview.htc"">",! Write "<IMPORT NAMESPACE=""SKLAD2"" IMPLEMENTATION=""htc/table.htc"">",! Write "<IMPORT NAMESPACE=""SKLADList"" IMPLEMENTATION=""htc/listview2.htc"">",! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write ! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"
